Articles.Content:
I'm trying to load up KSP and when I do the bar gets stuck and won't move. I went into file explorer and the image preview won't load. I'm on a windows 10 laptop using steam. I have reinstalled, validated files and restarted my laptop many times with no success, and I would post the log file but I can't find it.

Edited January 16, 2022 by Fluffysoup44

Hello,
I love to play games and recently I encounter that my Game not loading properly. Some time at the middle of the game my game starts lagging as sometimes it's sutter as well. I tried many solutions like Repair Corrupted or Broken mod, Enable Script Mods, Update the game, etc. But in case you still face the same issue then use a proper guide to resolve this Game not loading issue.
Do you have mods installed, @Daniel199730? If so please list them. It helps diagnose problems.
